request.description: Get a list of gift cards with pagination, sorting, and RBAC filtering. SUPERADMIN can filter by companyId and/or storeId. COMPANY_USER sees only their company's gift cards. STORE_USER sees only their store's company gift cards. Supports optional sorting by any field (default: id) in ASC or DESC order.

item.name: Get Gift Card by Serial Number

request.description: Get details of a specific gift card by serial number. Access is controlled by RBAC - users can only access gift cards from their assigned company/store.
Get details of a specific gift card by identifier. Access is controlled by RBAC - users can only access gift cards from their assigned company/store.
Create a single gift card. Can include store and item category limitations. Type can be PHYSICAL or DIGITAL (default: PHYSICAL).
Create multiple gift cards at once. Can include store and item category limitations. Type can be PHYSICAL or DIGITAL (default: PHYSICAL).
Limit a gift card to specific stores. Use this endpoint after creation to limit a gift card to specific stores.

item.name: Limit Gift Card to Item Categories

request.description: Limit a gift card to specific item categories. Use this endpoint after creation to limit a gift card to specific item categories.
Remove item category limitations from a gift card
Remove store limitations from a gift card

Register a gift card to the current authenticated user. Sets the gift card's customer if it is not already set. Requires user authentication and a mobile phone number. Returns error if gift card is already registered to a customer.

response.name: Error - Already Registered

request.description: Get gift cards for a specific customer. Accessible by API users (SUPERADMIN, ADMIN, API_USER) or the customer themselves (matched by phone number). API users can access any customer's gift cards. Regular customers can only access their own gift cards.

response.name: Error - Access Denied

request.description: Get gift cards for the current authenticated user's customer. Automatically finds customer by user's phone number. Returns paginated list of gift cards registered to the current user.
Block a gift card by serial number. Only accessible by ADMIN and SUPERADMIN. Records the user who blocked the card and the block date.

response.name: Error - Not Found

request.description: Unblock a gift card by serial number. Only accessible by ADMIN and SUPERADMIN. Clears the blockedBy and blockedDate fields.

response.name: Error - Not Found

item.name: Issue Gift Card (Store + Item Category Limited)

request.description: Create a gift card with both store and item category limitations
Create a gift card with only item category limitations (no store limitations)

Debit a gift card for a transaction. If a gift card is store-limited, it can only be used at the allowed stores. If a gift card is item-category-limited, it can only be used for items in the allowed categories. Attempting to use it at a non-allowed store or for non-allowed item categories will result in an error (-117).
Confirm a gift card transaction
Reverse a gift card transaction
Refund a gift card transaction
Check the status of a transaction
Get details of a specific transaction
Get transaction history for a gift card. Access is controlled by RBAC - users can only access transactions for gift cards from their assigned company/store.

request.description: Get settlement report for fulfilled gift card transactions. Shows inter-company settlements with payables (money to send) and receivables (money to receive). Includes master-level company summaries and detail-level store breakdowns. Accessible by COMPANY_USER (sees only their company's settlements - companyId is auto-set if not provided), ADMIN, and SUPERADMIN (sees all settlements).
